title: Story of standards
creator_credit: Larry Gosnell, Lawrence Cherry, Evelyn Cherry and ONF | NFB
brief_description: There are federal, provincial and municipal inspection services to grade and maintain the quality of agriculturally produced foods—meat, tinned goods, fresh produce and dairy products.
